data.text: Ɓɛnzamɛn ná-doun zunuiti ti-laaseigiti kaa: Ɓela ɠa é ɠɛni ga doun mɔungi, Asaɓɛle ɠɛ ga felesiɛi, saʋasiɛi ɠɛ ga Aala,
naanisiɛi ɠɛni ga Noɠa, dɔɔlusiɛi ɠɛ ga Lafa.
Ɓela doun zunuiti sɔlɔɔni: Adaal, Gela, Aɓiyude,
Aɓisua, Naaman, Aɠoa,
Gela, Sefufan, ta Ɠulame.
Eɠude ná-doun zunuiti Geɓa nuɓusɛiti ta-ʋɛlɛyeɠe lotuɠɔiti ti ti zeɠeni zeizu, ti naati sei Manaɠate. Ti-laaseigiti kaa:
Naaman, Ayiya, ta Gela, nii é ɠɛni ga Uza ta Ayiyude ti-ɠɛɛ, naa ɠa é loni seɠeseizui luɠɔ.
Saɠalayime anzaiti kpɛɛni, Ɠusime ta Ɓaala, naa ʋoluma é doun zunua zɔlɔɔni Moaɓe nɛmɛi zu.
É anzanu ɠili seini nii daaseigi ɠɛni ga Wodɛse, é doun zunuiti sɔlɔɔ naa ʋa, naati daaseigiti kaa: Yoɓaɓe, Siɓia, Mesa, Malekame,
Yeyuse, Sakia ta Miilima. Saɠalayime ná-doun zunuiti ti-laaseigiti kana, niiti ti ɠɛni ga pɛlɛyeɠe lotuɠɔiti.
Mɔunpa dɛ, é Aɓituɓe ta Ɛlɛpaale zɔlɔɔni anzai Ɠusime ʋa.
Ɛlɛpaale ná-doun zunuiti ti-laaseigiti kaa: Eɓɛɛl, Miseyame, ta Semɛde, nii é taa wola felegɔi niiti toni: Wono, ta Lode, é ʋɛɛ ti ɠoba laa goiti ba.
Ɓelia ta Sema, niiti ti ɠɛni ga pɛlɛyeɠe lotuɠɔiti Ayalon nuiti saama, ti Gate nuiti kpɛɛni.
Naa ʋoluma, Ɓelia ná-doun zunuiti ti-laaseigiti kaa: Ayiyo, Sasake, Yelemɔte,
Zeɓadia, Alade, Edɛɛl,
Mikayɛle, Yisifa ta Yoɠa,
Ɛlɛpaale ná-doun zunuiti ti-laaseigiti kaa: Zeɓadia, Mesulame, Yiziki, Ɠeɓɛɛl,
Yisemelayi, Yiziliya ta Yoɓaɓe.
Simeyi ná-doun zunuiti daaseigiti kaa: Yakime, Zikili, Zaɓidi,
Eliyenayi, Siletayi, Eliyɛle,
Adaya, Ɓelaya, ta Similate.
Naa ʋoluma, Sasake ná-doun zunuiti daaseigiti kaa: Yisipan, Eɓɛɛl, Eliyɛle,
Aɓadon, Zikili, Ɠanan,
Ɠanania, Elame, Antotiya,
Yifideya, ta Penuwele.
Yeloɠame ná-doun zunuiti daaseigiti kaa: Sameselai, Seɠalia, Atalia,
Yalesia, Eliya ta Zikili.
Naati ka ti ɠɛni ga pɛlɛyeɠe lotuɠɔiti, eɠɛʋelei ti-mavofodaiti ti la. Ti ɠɛni zeini Zeluzalɛme.
Gaɓaɠɔn kɛɛɠɛ ɠɛni zeini Gaɓaɠɔn taazuʋɛ, ta anzai nii daaseigi ɠɛni ga Maaka.
Ná-doun zunu mɔungi laaseigi ɠɛni ga Aɓadon, naa ʋolu Suul, Kise, Ɓaale, Nadaɓe,
Gedɔɔl, Ayiyo, ta Zekɛɛl.
Mikelɔte ná-doun zunui ɠɛni ga Simeya. Niima nuiti ɓalaa ti zeini Zeluzalɛme ti-ɠɛɛlointi koba.
Nɛɛl Kise zɔlɔɔni, Kise Sayile zɔlɔɔ. Sayile ná-doun zunuiti ti ɠɛni ga: Zonatan, Malekisua, Aɓinadaɓe, naa ʋɛɛ Eseɓaale ʋa.
Zonatan Meliɓe-Ɓaale zɔlɔɔni, Meliɓe-Ɓaale Misé zɔlɔɔ.
Misé ná-doun zunuiti ti ɠɛni ga: Piton, Melɛke, Taalea ta Aɠaze.
Aɠaze Yewoada zɔlɔɔni, Yewoada ná-doun zunuiti ti ɠɛni ga: Alemɛte, Azamavɛte, ta Zimili. Zimili Mosa zɔlɔɔni,
Mosa Ɓineya zɔlɔɔ, Ɓineya Lafa zɔlɔɔ, Lafa Eleyasa zɔlɔɔ, Eleyasa Asɛle zɔlɔɔ.
Doun zunu lɔzita ɠa Asɛle sɔlɔɔni, ti laaseigiti kaa: Azilikame, Ɓokelu, Isemayɛle, Sealia, Aɓediyase naa ʋɛɛ Ɠanan ʋa. Asɛle ná-doun zunuiti kana.
Asɛle kɛɛɠɛloin ɠɛni ga Esɛke. Esɛke ná-doun zunuiti daaseigiti kaa: Ulame ɠa é ɠɛni ga doun mɔungi, felesiɛi ɠɛ ga Yeyuse, saʋasiɛi ɠɛ ga Elifelɛte.

Ulame ná-doun zunuiti ti ɠɛni kɔɔɠɔ nu wolaiti, ti zoogai mɛɛin ʋilisu. Ti wola ɓuɠuni, ti-lointi ta ti-lounlointi gola mɔinni. Ti pɛ kpɔga ɠɛni ga nu ungila nu ʋuulɔɔlugɔ (150). Niima nuɓusɛiti pɛ ti ɠɛni ga Ɓɛnzamɛn mavofodaiti.
